item.title: Antrea - Kubernetes CNI
item.description: This is an introduction post to Antrea, what it is and which features it has. For more details head over to: https://antrea.io/ and https://github.com/antrea-io/antrea First of, Antrea is a CNI. CNI stands for Container Network Interface. As the world moves into Kubernetes more and more, we need a good CNI to support everything from network to security within Kubernetes. Thats where Antrea comes into play. Antrea has a rich set of features such as:
